title: Are More Localised Lockdowns Imminent? (with Tommy Sheppard MP)
itunes:title: Are More Localised Lockdowns Imminent? (with Tommy Sheppard MP)
description:
As virus cases flare up in pockets across the country, Tommy Sheppard, SNP MP for Edinburgh East, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why Saturday isn't the time for England's pubs to be reopening.

Plus, has the government got its mojo back? Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss whether Boris Johnson's speech landed a punch, and what to expect from Rishi Sunak's statement next week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
